summary: Adds a basement level to the Western Watchtower. It has everything an adventurer would ever need.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Hall of Storage to the Western Watchtower.
It has storage for all the items you may pick up on your travels.

Armor (standard, enchanted and unique).
Weapons (standard, enchanted and unique).
Clothing (standard, enchanted and unique).
Jewelry (standard, enchanted and unique)
Staves (standard and unique).
Dragon and Masks.
Arrows.
Gems and Soul Gems.
Spell Tomes, Scrolls, Books and Notes.
Food and Drink.
Ingredients, Potions and Poisons.
Crafting, Other and Special.

And a bed.

All crafting stations are available, as well as 9 mannequins, 6 weapon racks and 5 weapon plaques.

I made this for me because I hoard everything and trying to sift through hundreds of item in one chest became too hard, and trying to remember which chest contained what was again too hard.


Version History:

1.0 - Added most chests and a bed.
1.1 - Added more chests (Jewelry, Dragon and Masks), mannequins and crafting stations.
1.15 - Fixed the \'jewlery\' mistake.
1.16 - Fixed the second \'jewelery\' mistake (why can\'t I spell?). Fixed the alignment for the cooking pot.
2.0 - Previous jewelry chests have been removed and replaced. Cooking pot has been replaced with a pot and spit over a fire. Added weapon racks and plaques to the mannequin corridor. This version also has added support for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9555]Western Watchtower Rebuilt[/url].

Future Versions:

Add bookshelves(!).
A training room that allows you to \'summon\' skeletons/draugr/bandits (or some such) to battle with and train offensive and defensive skills with/on (hopefully not a spell/power, but we\'ll see).

If you would prefer to use the Steam Workshop then here you go: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=21352]Hall of Storage[/url]
author: AzirAphale001
